verses.verse: After<WG3326> these<WG5023> things Jesus<WG2424> walked<WG4043> in Galilee:<WG1056> for he would<WG2309> not walk<WG4043> in Jewry,<WG2449> because<WG3754> the Jews<WG2453> sought<WG2212> to kill<WG615> him.
Now<WG1161> the Jew's<WG2453> feast<WG1859> of tabernacles<WG4634> was at<WG1451> hand.<WG1451>

His brothers<WG80> therefore<WG3767> said<WG2036> to him, Depart<WG3327> hence,<WG1782> and go<WG5217> into<WG1519> Judaea,<WG2449> that your disciples<WG3101> also<WG2532> may see<WG2334> the works<WG2041> that you do.<WG4160>

For there is no<WG3762> man<WG3762> that does<WG4160> any<WG5100> thing in secret,<WG2927> and he himself<WG846> seeks<WG2212> to be known openly.<WG1722> <WG3954> If<WG1487> you do<WG4160> these<WG5023> things, show<WG5319> yourself<WG4572> to the world.<WG2889>
For neither<WG3761> did his brothers<WG80> believe<WG4100> in him.
Then<WG3767> Jesus<WG2424> said<WG3004> to them, My time<WG2540> is not yet<WG3768> come:<WG3918> but your<WG5212> time<WG2540> is always<WG3842> ready. <WG2092>
The world<WG2889> cannot <WG3756> <WG1410> hate<WG3404> you; but me it hates,<WG3404> because<WG3754> I testify<WG3140> of it, that the works<WG2041> thereof <WG3012> <WG846> are evil. <WG4190>
Go<WG305> you up to this<WG5026> feast:<WG1859> I go<WG305> not up yet<WG3768> to this<WG5026> feast:<WG1859> for my time<WG2540> is not yet<WG3768> full<WG4137> come. <WG4137>
When he had said<WG2036> these<WG5023> words to them, he stayed<WG3306> still in Galilee.<WG1056>
But when<WG5613> his brothers<WG80> were gone<WG305> up, then<WG5119> went<WG305> he also<WG2532> up to the feast,<WG1859> not openly,<WG5320> but as it were in secret.<WG2927>
Then<WG3767> the Jews<WG2453> sought<WG2212> him at<WG1722> the feast,<WG1859> and said,<WG3004> Where<WG4226> is he?

And there was much<WG4183> murmuring<WG1112> among<WG1722> the people<WG3793> concerning<WG4012> him: for some<WG3588> <WG3303> said,<WG3004> He is a good<WG18> man: others<WG243> said,<WG3004> No;<WG3756> but he deceives<WG4105> the people.<WG3793>
However,<WG3305> no<WG3762> man<WG3762> spoke<WG2980> openly<WG3954> of him for fear<WG5401> of the Jews.<WG2453>
Now<WG2235> about the middle<WG3322> of the feast<WG1859> Jesus<WG2424> went<WG305> up into<WG1519> the temple,<WG2411> and taught.<WG1321>
And the Jews<WG2453> marveled,<WG2296> saying,<WG3004> How<WG4459> knows<WG1492> this<WG3778> man letters,<WG1121> having never<WG3361> learned?<WG3129>
Jesus<WG2424> answered<WG611> them, and said,<WG2036> My doctrine<WG1322> is not mine,<WG1699> but his that sent<WG3992> me.

If<WG1437> any<WG5100> man will<WG2309> do<WG4160> his will,<WG2307> he shall know<WG1097> of the doctrine,<WG1322> whether<WG4220> it be of God,<WG2316> or <WG2228> whether I speak<WG2980> of myself. <WG1683>

He that speaks<WG2980> of himself<WG1438> seeks<WG2212> his own<WG2398> glory:<WG1391> but he that seeks<WG2212> his glory<WG1391> that sent<WG3992> him, the same<WG3778> is true,<WG227> and no<WG3756> unrighteousness<WG93> is in him.
Did not Moses<WG3475> give<WG1325> you the law,<WG3551> and yet none<WG3762> of you keeps<WG4160> the law?<WG3551> Why<WG5101> go<WG2212> you about<WG2212> to kill<WG615> me?
The people<WG3793> answered<WG611> and said,<WG2036> You have<WG2192> a devil:<WG1140> who<WG5101> goes<WG2212> about<WG2212> to kill<WG615> you?
Jesus<WG2424> answered<WG611> and said<WG2036> to them, I have<WG2192> done<WG4160> one<WG1520> work,<WG2041> and you all<WG3956> marvel. <WG2296>

Moses<WG3475> therefore <WG1223> <WG5124> gave<WG1325> to you circumcision;<WG4061> (not because<WG3754> it is of Moses,<WG3475> but of the fathers; <WG3962> ) and you on<WG1722> the sabbath<WG4521> day circumcise<WG4059> a man. <WG444>

If<WG1487> a man<WG444> on<WG1722> the sabbath<WG4521> day receive<WG2983> circumcision,<WG4061> that the law<WG3551> of Moses<WG3475> should not be broken;<WG3089> are you angry<WG5520> at me, because<WG3754> I have<WG2192> made<WG4160> a man<WG444> every<WG3650> whit<WG3650> whole<WG5199> on<WG1722> the sabbath<WG4521> day?
Judge<WG2919> not according<WG2596> to the appearance,<WG3799> but judge<WG2919> righteous<WG1342> judgment. <WG2920>
Then<WG3767> said<WG3004> some<WG5100> of them of Jerusalem,<WG2414> Is not this<WG3778> he, whom<WG3739> they seek<WG2212> to kill?<WG615>
But, see,<WG2396> he speaks<WG2980> boldly,<WG3954> and they say<WG3004> nothing<WG3762> to him. Do the rulers<WG758> know<WG1097> indeed<WG230> that this<WG3778> is the very<WG230> Christ?<WG5547>
However,<WG235> we know<WG1492> this<WG5126> man from where<WG4159> he is: but when<WG3752> Christ<WG5547> comes,<WG2064> no<WG3762> man<WG3762> knows<WG1097> from where<WG4159> he is.

Then<WG3767> cried<WG2896> Jesus<WG2424> in the temple<WG2411> as he taught,<WG1321> saying,<WG3004> You both<WG2532> know<WG1492> me, and you know<WG1492> from where<WG4159> I am:<WG1510> and I am not come<WG2064> of myself,<WG1683> but he that sent<WG3992> me is true,<WG228> whom<WG3739> you know<WG1492> not.
But I know<WG1492> him: for I am<WG1510> from him, and he has sent<WG649> me.
Then<WG3767> they sought<WG2212> to take<WG4084> him: but no<WG3762> man<WG3762> laid<WG1911> hands<WG5495> on<WG1909> him, because<WG3754> his hour<WG5610> was not yet<WG3768> come.<WG2064>

And many<WG4183> of the people<WG3793> believed<WG4100> on<WG1519> him, and said,<WG3004> When<WG3752> Christ<WG5547> comes,<WG2064> will he do<WG4160> more<WG4119> miracles<WG4592> than these<WG5130> which<WG3739> this<WG3778> man has done?<WG4160>

The Pharisees<WG5330> heard<WG191> that the people<WG3793> murmured<WG1111> such<WG5023> things concerning<WG4012> him; and the Pharisees<WG5330> and the chief<WG749> priests<WG749> sent<WG649> officers<WG5257> to take<WG4084> him.
Then<WG3767> said<WG2036> Jesus<WG2424> to them, Yet<WG2089> a little<WG3398> while<WG5550> am<WG1510> I with you, and then<WG3767> I go<WG5217> to him that sent<WG3992> me.
You shall seek<WG2212> me, and shall not find <WG2147> me: and where<WG3699> I am, <WG1510> thither you cannot <WG3756> <WG1410> come. <WG2064>

Then<WG3767> said<WG2036> the Jews<WG2453> among<WG4314> themselves,<WG1438> Where<WG4226> will<WG3195> he go,<WG4198> that we shall not find<WG2147> him? will<WG3195> he go<WG4198> to the dispersed<WG1290> among the Gentiles,<WG1672> and teach<WG1321> the Gentiles?<WG1672>

What<WG5101> manner of saying<WG3056> is this<WG3778> that he said,<WG2036> You shall seek me, and shall not find<WG2147> me: and where<WG3699> I am,<WG1510> thither you cannot<WG3756> <WG1410> come?<WG2064>

In the last<WG2078> day,<WG2250> that great<WG3173> day of the feast,<WG1859> Jesus<WG2424> stood<WG2476> and cried,<WG2896> saying,<WG3004> If<WG1437> any<WG5100> man thirst,<WG1372> let him come<WG2064> to me, and drink. <WG4095>
He that believes<WG4100> on<WG1519> me, as the scripture<WG1124> has said,<WG2036> out of his belly<WG2836> shall flow<WG4482> rivers<WG4215> of living<WG2198> water. <WG5204>

(But this<WG5124> spoke<WG2036> he of the Spirit,<WG4151> which<WG3739> they that believe<WG4100> on<WG1519> him should<WG3195> receive:<WG2983> for the Holy<WG40> Ghost<WG4151> was not yet<WG3768> given; because<WG3754> that Jesus<WG2424> was not yet<WG3764> glorified.<WG1392>)
Many<WG4183> of the people<WG3793> therefore,<WG3767> when they heard<WG191> this<WG3588> saying,<WG3056> said,<WG3004> Of a truth<WG230> this<WG3778> is the Prophet.<WG4396>
Others<WG243> said,<WG3004> This<WG3778> is the Christ.<WG5547> But some<WG243> said,<WG3004> Shall Christ<WG5547> come<WG2064> out of Galilee?<WG1056>
Has not the scripture<WG1124> said,<WG2036> That Christ<WG5547> comes<WG2064> of the seed<WG4690> of David,<WG1138> and out of the town<WG2968> of Bethlehem,<WG965> where<WG3699> David<WG1138> was?
So<WG3767> there was a division<WG4978> among<WG1722> the people<WG3793> because<WG1223> of him.
And some<WG5100> of them would<WG2309> have taken<WG4084> him; but no<WG3762> man<WG3762> laid<WG1911> hands<WG5495> on<WG1909> him.
Then<WG3767> came<WG2064> the officers<WG5257> to the chief<WG749> priests<WG749> and Pharisees;<WG5330> and they said<WG2036> to them, Why<WG1302> have you not brought<WG71> him?
The officers<WG5257> answered,<WG611> Never<WG3763> man<WG444> spoke<WG2980> like<WG3779> this<WG3778> man.<WG444>
Then<WG3767> answered<WG611> them the Pharisees,<WG5330> Are you also<WG2532> deceived?<WG4105>
Have any<WG3387> of the rulers<WG758> or<WG2228> of the Pharisees<WG5330> believed<WG4100> on<WG1519> him?
But this<WG3778> people<WG3793> who<WG3588> knows<WG1097> not the law<WG3551> are cursed.<WG1944>
Nicodemus<WG3530> said<WG3004> to them, (he that came<WG2064> to Jesus<WG846> by night,<WG3571> being<WG5607> one<WG1520> of them,)
Does our law<WG3551> judge<WG2919> any<WG3588> man,<WG444> before<WG3362> <WG4386> it hear<WG191> him, and know<WG1097> what<WG5101> he does?<WG4160>
They answered<WG611> and said<WG2036> to him, Are<WG1488> you also<WG2532> of Galilee?<WG1056> Search,<WG2045> and look:<WG1492> for out of Galilee<WG1056> rises<WG1453> no<WG3756> prophet.<WG4396>
And every<WG1538> man went<WG4198> to his own house.<WG3624>
